mapper.select: SELECT JM.JEW_MDIS_SNO ,JM.MDIS_NUM ,JM.MDIS_TYPE ,JM.MDIS_KOR_NM ,JM.MDIS_EN_NM ,JM.DATA_OF_FORM ,JM.PROJECT_KOR_NM ,JM.PROJECT_EN_NM ,JM.PI ,JM.CO_PI ,JM.ORGANIZATION ,JM.SUPPORTING_ORGANIZATION ,JM.COPYRIGHT_HOLDER ,JM.INVESTIGATE_PURPOSE ,JM.INVESTIGATE_CONTENT ,JM.KEYWORD ,JM.COLLECTION_STR_DAY ,JM.COLLECTION_END_DAY ,JM.INVESTIGATE_AREA ,JM.ANALYSIS_UNIT ,JM.SUBJECT ,JM.MDIS_TIME ,JM.RESEARCH_ORGANIZATION ,JM.INTERVIEW_SURVEY ,JM.SELF_ADMINISTERED_SURVEY ,JM.MAIL_SURVEY ,JM.PHONE_SURVEY ,JM.ONLINE_SURVEY ,JM.ETC_SURVEY ,JM.EXTRACTION ,JM.CASE_NUMBER ,JM.WEIGHT ,JM.DATA_FORM ,JM.DATA_STRUCTURE ,JM.MDIS_LANGUAGE ,JM.PUBLIC_YN ,JM.PUBLIC_REASONS ,JM.REMARK ,JM.ETC ,JM.DATA_FILE ,JM.USE_YN ,JM.DELETE_YN ,JM.REG_DT ,JM.REG_ID ,JM.MOD_DT ,JM.MOD_ID FROM JEW_MDIS JM WHERE 1=1 AND JM.JEW_MDIS_SNO = #{jewMdisSno}

SELECT JM.JEW_MDIS_SNO ,JM.MDIS_NUM ,JM.MDIS_TYPE ,JM.MDIS_KOR_NM ,JM.MDIS_EN_NM ,JM.DATA_OF_FORM ,JM.PROJECT_KOR_NM ,JM.PROJECT_EN_NM ,JM.PI ,JM.CO_PI ,JM.ORGANIZATION ,JM.SUPPORTING_ORGANIZATION ,JM.COPYRIGHT_HOLDER ,JM.INVESTIGATE_PURPOSE ,JM.INVESTIGATE_CONTENT ,JM.KEYWORD ,JM.COLLECTION_STR_DAY ,JM.COLLECTION_END_DAY ,JM.INVESTIGATE_AREA ,JM.ANALYSIS_UNIT ,JM.SUBJECT ,JM.MDIS_TIME ,JM.RESEARCH_ORGANIZATION ,JM.INTERVIEW_SURVEY ,JM.SELF_ADMINISTERED_SURVEY ,JM.MAIL_SURVEY ,JM.PHONE_SURVEY ,JM.ONLINE_SURVEY ,JM.ETC_SURVEY ,JM.EXTRACTION ,JM.CASE_NUMBER ,JM.WEIGHT ,JM.DATA_FORM ,JM.DATA_STRUCTURE ,JM.MDIS_LANGUAGE ,JM.PUBLIC_YN ,JM.PUBLIC_REASONS ,JM.REMARK ,JM.ETC ,JM.DATA_FILE ,JM.USE_YN ,JM.DELETE_YN ,JM.REG_DT ,JM.REG_ID ,JM.MOD_DT ,JM.MOD_ID FROM JEW_MDIS JM WHERE 1=1 AND JM.DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY JM.MDIS_NUM ASC
